overview: Mirac is 35 years old, a psychic who is fond of religious duties. Having lost his family in a traffic accident at a young age, Mirac starts to stay with his grandmother, Döne. Döne is a sorcerer who casts evil spells and gets the help of a genie named Ummar. Mirac is disturbed by his grandmother's evil spells and escapes from his grandmother and settles in Istanbul.
title: El-Ummar: Cin Yuvası
